evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff the City of Columbus, Ohio, is a municipal corporation organized under Ohio law. ... Plaintiff the Mayor and City Council of Baltimore represent the largest city in Maryland ... Plaintiff the City of Chicago, Illinois, is a municipal corporation and home-rule unit organized and existing under the constitution and law of the state of Illinois.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Doctors for America (DFA) is a not-for-profit, § 501(c)(3) organization ... Plaintiff Main Street Alliance (MSA) is 501(c)(3) organization and national network of small businesses...

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant Robert F. Kennedy, Jr., is sued in his official capacity as Secretary of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services ... Defendant HHS is a federal agency ... Defendant Mehmet Oz is sued in his official capacity as Administrator of CMS ... Defendant CMS is a component of Defendant HHS...
